Description: Fragment of oval handle of a Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine red-brown. Rectangular stamp with bucraneum symbol.
Type series: KT330 (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Curator's comments: Names Poliouchos, Astragalos. Parallels are noted by N. Jefremow, Die Amphorenstempel des hellenistischen Knidos, Munich 1995, 205-6, nos 683-8..
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (294)
